typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(mytime = toTimestamp(1574127407*1000l)

) ~> DerivedColumn1
